stimulusHtml: A copper rod of resistance R is in electrical contact with a frictionless U-shaped rail of width L and negligible resistance. The rod is pulled to the right at a constant velocity  v → MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C6B@ . A magnetic field B → MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C37@ is directed into the page, as shown in the figure above. Under these conditions, the electric power dissipated in the rod is P. If the velocity of the rod is doubled and the magnetic field strength is reduced by half, the power dissipated in the rod is
